## kl vpn stop

stop vpn device

### Synopsis

```
This command let you stop running vpn device.
Example:
  # stop vpn device
  sudo kl vpn stop
	
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help      help for stop
  -v, --verbose   run in debug mode
  -h, --help   help for stop
```
